thread.title: Could you go a whole month without spending a penny? | Central
thread.title_full: Could you go a whole month without spending a penny? | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Could you go a whole month without spending a penny? | Central
text:
Self-confessed shopaholic Jackie Mather set herself a challenge not to spend a penny during January after realising she had to curb her spending habits.
At midnight tonight, she will have successfully completed her "no spend" task which she says has been the hardest thing she's ever done.
She set about it after spending more than £5000 on Christmas.
Credit: PA Psychology teacher Jackie from Bramcote, Notts, has managed to survive by "trading" - offering services like ironing, cleaning, private tuition, etc, in return for food.
It only covered the basics so she had to give up going to a friend's hen do and going out for her 10th wedding anniversary.
A keen jogger, she even ditched the car and ran to friends' houses to avoid buying petrol.
During the month, she's saved £1500 which she plans to use for her and her husband to go on holiday to Dubai later in the year.
Tonight on ITV Central we meet Jackie and hear the highs and lows of her penniless month.
Last updated Tue 31 Jan 2017 East Midlands Nottingham
